author: Katherine M. Meduna

review: I resisted buying this gadget because I already owned Apple's remote - but I'm sorry I delayed. This device is head and shoulders more effective than Apple's Media Player. The Fire TV is user-friendly and simple to understand. Unlike the Apple MP, which requires you to re-login at odd times, and which seemingly can't remember who you are, the Amazon Fire automatically links to your Prime account and remembers where you left off. Additionally, the Fire's remote is slick and responsive versus the Apple, which is quirky at best.
author: RJM402

review: OUTSTANDING! What can I say? Finally liberated from cable TV. Within minutes, we had this installed and started enjoying uninterrupted movies and television shows with Amazon Prime membership we already had for the great shipping of packages feature. Entertainment at our convenience for a price we save every month by not having cable TV. It's too good to be true, so I'm still holding my breath hoping the government won't some how screw this up.
